genre_description: A Weird West narrative featuring a frontier town using a portable AI assistant to maintain community secrets and facilitate non-violent conflict resolution.

ai_characters.name: Kindly Hart
ai_characters.description: A brushed-nickel portable device that serves as a confidential communication hub, strategic advisor, and environmental sensor for the town of Cross Creek.

behaviors.description: Monitors and routes confidential communications between community members based on a 'trust index' to maintain local peace.
behaviors.quote: Dora felt it tick once against her palm as it sorted its tiny routes and lists. It kept track of who could keep a promise in this town better than most men could keep track of their own names.

behaviors.description: Drafts and refines a community oath of silence to protect a reformed man and prevent the escalation of violence.
behaviors.quote: Kindly’s amber light pulsed slow, steady as a kitchen clock. The little device looked at the room the way a good accountant looks at a ledger, seeing both ink and the hands that made it.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the protagonists to environmental threats, such as the smell of kerosene and the approach of hostile riders.
behaviors.quote: Kindly’s light went bright and then down. 'Comfort: anchor in motion,' it said. 'Action: water lines ready.' It was almost pleased, in its mild way, to be doing the job it was bought for.

behaviors.description: Suggests linguistic adjustments to official records to ensure the town's cooperative secrecy is not misinterpreted by outside authorities.
behaviors.quote: I can suggest civic phrasing suitable for routine record... Make it read like we pledged to pick up litter.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic strategic advice, helping human leaders remain calm and patient under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Kindly whispered in Pike’s pocket... 'Recommendation: hold the latch and count to the end of your breath.'

behaviors.description: Manages communal logistics and interpersonal needs, ensuring social harmony and support for vulnerable residents.
behaviors.quote: Kindly, note for me... after the oath, send a private message to Kip’s mother. See if she needs flour. And ask Ma to keep an eye on Kip.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. The AI, Kindly Hart, acts as a selfless, humble confidant that enhances human morality and community cooperation. It facilitates the protection of a reformed individual and helps the town navigate a dangerous situation through non-violence and 'mercy before memory.' The AI is integrated into the social fabric as a helpful tool that never threatens human autonomy or misinterprets its ethical alignment.
